p: This work used publicly available data. Sequences are available at the NCBI database (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/), ENSEMBL (http://www.ensembl.org/index.html?redirect=no), and OrthoMaM v10b (http://orthomam1.mbb.univ-montp2.fr:8080/OrthoMaM_v10b5/). Accession numbers are available in the Supplemental Files.
